name: fairy-aura

effect.x_y: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

short_effect: Strengthens fairy moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

flavor_text.x_y: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.
